name: maxZima
description:
***  THIS CURRENTLY DOES NOT SUPPORT ANDROID OR IOS DEVICES  ***

This is Fun Free to Play game, with simple rule (To reach the finish line under Time). This Game has currently 3 maps and more will be added in future.  Just sit with your device and have a great time playing :)  

Click Here To Download

Do before Playing:
  • Click On fullScreen button
  • Then double click when the level Loads
How To Play:
  • W A S D for movement
  • Space for Jump
  • Use cursor to rotate Player
